name: Conga 4096
overview: A game created by Paul Koller and released in 2018 in the 2018 C64 4KB Game Coding Competition, Good Old 8-Bit Games #1 and in Reset Magazine. It is a 4k game where you whip around a bullet trail to destroy the baddies, try to survive and rack up as much points as possible. You aren't shooting the bullets, they follow behind you like the tail of a kite. Watch out for the plusses, they may be invulnerable.
